Age at Cohort Entry – PCORnet

Source: R/cohort_prep.R
compute_age_groups_pcnt.Rd

Age at Cohort Entry – PCORnet

Usage

compute_age_groups_pcnt(cohort_tbl, person_tbl, age_groups)

Arguments

cohort_tbl

table of cohort members with at least person_id, start_date, and end_date

person_tbl

the CDM person table

age_groups

a table where the user defines the minimum and maximum age allowed for a group and provides a string name for the group

Value

cohort_tbl with the age at cohort entry and age group for each patient

On this page
